price: الله به ووايي: (اوس) زما پر وړاندې ناندرۍ مه وهئ، ما خو لا مخکې د عذاب ژمنه درلېږلې وه.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-waʿīdi
